attributes.action: Make the First £5000 of Occupational Pensions ( When paid ), TAX FREE.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In order to encourage the 'Employed' to contribute towards their Retirement Pension, the First £5000 per Annum, of Occupational, or Private Pension, should be Tax Free when the individual retires. Under the current Taxation Rules, you ARE taxed on it. This would apply to the Governments 'Stakeholder' Pension fund also.
Where an individual has more than One Occ. Pension then the sum of all those pensions would be taken into the calculation.
